messages.title: VOTE GREEN PARTY TODAY
messages.content: Anna Key is your Green councillor for St. Michael’s ward, working full time for you since 2011.

messages.title: End the Library closures. A new chapter for local residents.
messages.content: Green Councillors propose a new community trust to protect our local library.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anna has campaigned to stop the City Council's closure of libraries and Sure Start centres.
Anna has worked to stop inappropriate new housing developments on Sefton Park Meadows.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting instructions advise to vote on the yellow ballot paper.

housing.content: Anna has worked to stop inappropriate new housing developments on Sefton Park Meadows.

images.caption: Anna on a doorstep speaking with residents
Anna with volunteers cleaning a park
Anna with children at a local school
Anna holding a poster reading ‘Save our Green Space’

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be designed to promote Anna Key's re-election campaign, focusing on local issues and her efforts for the community.
